name: To Those Who Wait
description: Classic Czech-Style Pilsner brewed with Bohemian Pilsner malt and a boat load of Saaz hops for notes of bread crust, grape nuts with a balancing floral/spicy bitterness
story: Inspired by Head Brewer, Clint Lohman's, favorite beer, Pilsner Urquell; the original Pilsner-Style Beer.
tasting: Notes of bread crust & grape nuts w/ a balancing floral/spicy bitterness
